title: Are there any free online classes for SSC CGL? - Quora
tags: Staff Selection Commission Combined Graduate Level Exam

response.answer_text: Yes, there are some online coaching and some who writes blogs does provide free online class but most of them are just attention seeking. At the end of the day you will find that they are just beating about the bush. For instance, Unacademy it provides and has provided free classes but you will see that most of them are of no use. I have also used online platform for study but for selective chapters. And I scored a decent mark. In math 153 in English 177. But i had taken the help of online coaching for maths. I will tell you chapter-wise which coaching is best. For CI & SI and PERCENTAGE just watch the videos of RAKESH YADAV. I can vouch for that you will get no better video on internet for these two chapter than this. TAKSHZILA ACADEMY. this is mainly for CAT . There are some video of arithmetic that has been given on this site. they are excellent. ABHINAV MATH. this is also a good site. you can watch arithmetic as well as advance portion on this. this is also very qualitative video. I am telling you this from my perspective. This might or might not work for you.

Yes there are online free classes for SSC CGL. I would personally suggest you to go with SSCADDA YouTube . They are the SSC wing of Adda247 and they cover all the examinations that come under SSC and railways also like CGL, SSC CPO, CHSL, RRB NTPC and JE. They have the best faculties for each and every subject from all across the nation. They provide Live classes, free PDFs, detailed and accurate analysis of each and every exam. You can even ask the question directly to the faculties during the live class. They also have fixed timing of each and every class for SSC CGL 2019 you can watch them for free. The schedule is as follows: 7:00 PM - SSC CGL/CPO General Science8:00 PM - SSC CGL/CPO Maths9:00 PM - SSC CGL/CPO English10:00 PM - SSC CGL/CPO Reasoning11:00 PM - SSC CGL MathsYou can try the class once it won’t cost you anything and I can bet that you will like the session for sure. Thank You

You can find a websites like grade up and wifi study. Who provides free online classes as well. But, that can be worked, when you already aware of whole the syllabus and you already know that what you need to study. Because. those free classes will not provide you whole the content you want. They provide online videos for few topics only. If you want the whole syllabus classes, then you need to pay for that. If you are beginner then do not go with the free classes. Just buy some online coaching for whole SSC course. Where you will get the books, classes and other study stuff as well. I took coaching from Vidya Guru coaching center. Which was proven good decision of mine. I have studied at home only and still taking help from those content. So, buy some professional coaching instead of looking for free classes.

Hey, there are various online platforms which are providing time to time free classes for the different govt exams on youtube and other platforms but the problems with these classes are that most of the platform gives an only sample or partial classes on the youtube or any free public platforms. we at the Oliveboard are also starting the SSC Courses but here we are different from all other platforms and the difference is we are giving the complete course absolutely free this time. I would like to add some more things here that you know we are also run as a company and definitely we also work for profit but as marketing this time we are running this course absolutely free. this is another discussion here I can say only one thing that you will get the complete course absolutely free on our official youtube channel. thanks.

Yes, I know about this one free online class for SSC CGL preparation named Topline Coaching which is completely free for the starting one month. There are no hidden charges and afterwards you can continue at very affordable cost. There are many online classes available in the market which are sworn upon to be free but with all the hidden costs and amount asked later (during or after enrolling) makes them nowhere close of even being affordable leave alone the term “free”. So in my personal view you should go for the online classes that give you the option to at least get a free access for a long time somewhere around a month or so just like Topline Coaching, so that you can decide how effective it is for your preparation. Best of Luck!

Yes.. You can watch Vidya Guru youtube channel. Subscribe to their online channel. Their youtube lectures are fabulous. Well presentation of topic. Short cut tricks. According to exam syllabus and tricks are really good. I really loved English and Math lectures. One of my cousin is also preparing with the help of their youtube lectures and his learnt a lot. Plus, he used to make notes too. Current affairs are really good and you don’t need to go to any other resource once you Subscribe to Vidya Guru youtube channel. I am sharing for of their videos with you must watch them for great idea.

There is no one site available online. You cannot get a set of videos online but you can certainly get video classes for different subjects online. SSC adda is a good website and you can prefer a video classes which must have more than 10 practice questions. With the help of them you can learn as well as practice as well. I have learnt with the help of Vidya Guru online course and live classes. You an join their youtube channel. Just subscribe that channel for updated youtube classes or you can subscribe through their website as well. www.vidyaguru.in

Yes there are a few of them. You can get a list of them on Google. But an honest suggestion is try going for paid online classes because the end goal of every business is profit. So a few of them will give you free content for sometime but later they will ask you to buy something or the other. So its definitely better to look for a trusted class . There are classes who wont charge you much yet will give you get study content .
There's a YouTube channel named Online Guruji. It has got some good quality mathematics videos. You can give it a try yourself. They are worth watching.

Subscribe to Vidya Guru youtube channel. Vidya Guru lecture videos are really nice and present all lectures related to latest pattern of exam only. Must watch Sonia mam’am English and Current affairs video. The way she presented the lectures is really awesome. You will end up with all the content memorized as well after watching their current affairs and maths videos. Watch some videos posted below. You can get the best idea. I think you should subscribe Vidya Guru channel only for best preparation.
There are many online classes for SSC. You can purchase some pendrive course for it ke you can watch free videos on the Unacademy/GradeUp app on your smartphone.
you can go through this video to analyse your concept clearity

There are number of websites offer coaching through online,but the thing is that all websites aim to promote visitors in their website. If you want to prepare really you should purchase some good book,study the syllabus
A channel on youtube named Wifi Study providing free coaching for ssc cgl. You can go through their videos.
